items.title: Merchant bankers earn more than Rs 220 crore as IPO fees in May
items.description: The month of May saw a revival of sorts of the primary market with three main board IPOs — Schloss Bangalore (Leela Hotels), Aegis Vopak Terminals and Belrise Industries.

items.title: NHPC drops plan to buy PSU peers' stake in PTC India, says report
items.description: NHPC, NTPC, Power Grid and Power Finance Corporation each held 4.05% stake in PTC India, as at the end of the March quarter.

items.title: RR Kabel Allots 13,332 Shares Under ESOP 2020
items.description: RR Kabel Allots 13,332 Shares Under ESOP 2020

items.title: Infosys Shares Gain Nearly 1%, Among Top Gainers on Nifty 50 in Today's Trading Session
items.description: With the stock's current price at Rs 1,639.90, Infosys showed a positive movement of 0.99% during today's session.

items.title: Taking Stock: Nifty ends at around 24,850, Sensex down 213 pts; pharma stocks worst hit
items.description: Top Nifty losers were Adani Enterprises, Dr Reddy's Labs, Sun Pharma, Eternal, ONGC, while gainers were Tech Mahindra, Infosys, Asian Paints, TCS, Maruti Suzuki.

items.title: Gainers & Losers: Top stocks that moved the most on June 17
items.description: From shipping stocks to realty stocks, here are the top stocks that moved the most on June 17 trading session

items.title: Nifty Fails To Hold 24,900 As Iran-Israel Tensions Flare; Oil Rebounds| Closing Bell Live
items.description: Nifty fails to defend 24,900 as Iran-Israel tensions escalate . 24,800 support holds for now; India VIX eases over 3(%) .Midcap index takes a sharper knock; breadth negative Pharma index takes a knock . Trump says 'pharma tariffs coming very soon'. IT sole sectoral gainer; gains in 9 out of last 10 sessions.

items.title: Reliance Power stock hits 5% lower circuit on profit booking, extends losses to 17% in 4 sessions after rallying 70% in 1 month
items.description: Reliance Power share price: Despite the recent downturn, the stock is still a whopping 147% higher than its 52-week low of Rs 25.75 per share.

items.title: Pharma stocks sharply tumble as Donald Trump says 'pharma tariffs coming very soon'; Granules, Lupin, Laurus Labs fall up to 4%
items.description: Pharma stocks: The Nifty Pharma index plunged nearly 2% to close as the top sectoral loser after Trump's statement.

items.title: Siemens consortium gets Rs 4,100-crore order from National High Speed Rail Corp, shares rise 3%
items.description: Siemens share price: Siemens said that it alone will have a share of Rs 1,230 crore for the design, installation and long-term maintenance of advanced signaling and telecommunications technologies, as part of the project.

items.title: 2W, PV and CV sales decline in May as tepid demand, high financing costs linger
items.description: India’s passenger vehicle market is cooling off, with growth seen slowing to 1–2 percent in FY26 from 3 percent last year, as affordability issues, macro uncertainty, and changing buyer preferences weigh on demand.

items.title: Sensex slips 270 pts, Nifty below 24,900 as pharma, metal stocks fall; IT, realty shine
items.description: India VIX, the barometer to assess market anxiety, dropped over 3 percent to 14.39, signalling easing investor anxiety and lower near-term market volatility.

items.title: MCX shares hit fresh high on likely plans to launch electricity derivatives this year
items.description: MCX share price: While MCX shares gained following the latest news, its rival Indian Energy Exchange (IEX) saw its share price decline by nearly 1.5%.

items.title: Mazagon Dock, BDL, other defence stocks rally up to 5% as Israel-Iran war enters 5th day: What lies ahead?
items.description: Defence stocks: 'While the momentum may fluctuate, the long-term outlook for India’s defence sector remains structurally attractive in an increasingly uncertain global landscape,' says Ajit Mishra from Religare Broking.

items.title: Is the cigarette major still a value play?
items.description: A possible taxation shock could create near-term demand headwinds

items.title: Ajanta Pharma Promoter Pledges 2.6 Lakh Shares for Lender Change
items.description: Ajanta Pharma: Promoter Pledges 2.6 Lakh Shares for Lender Change

items.title: Sun Pharmaceutical Industries Stock Falls 2.02% in Today's Trading Session
items.description: With the stock's current price at Rs 1,651.20, Sun Pharmaceutical Industries experienced a downturn in today's session, influenced by bearish investor sentiment.
